comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end. Note that `advanced protection` should be enabled.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters, clear your user rules (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tech.onliner.by](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftech.onliner.by) ### Comment > На всём поддомене tech.onliner.by пропускает рекламу. В новостях еще добавляется баннер после статьи. С выключенным AdGuard показывает совершенно другую рекламу. Первый скриншот - AdGuard включен, второй (салатовый) - выключен. На других поддоменах onliner пропуска рекламы замечено не было. В системе также установлен Kaspersky Standart с выключенным антибаннером. Отключение антивируса никак не влияет. comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

> annoying pop-ups

Hi.
We need to know the source site. If redirect or opening of new tab is random, probably your system or browser is infected by [adware](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/adware)
Please scan your system using [AdwCleaner](https://www.malwarebytes.com/adwcleaner/)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.chamberorganizer.com/members/evr/reg_event.php?orgcode=BCCC&%3Bevid=76181603&%3Bfbclid=IwAR2z0mXNIq9dUHrhONRmRA8qMqt1X3kX6SSs6wCUiXjdjY4skukR99W1nhg](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chamberorganizer.com%2Fmembers%2Fevr%2Freg_event.php%3Forgcode%3DBCCC%26amp%253Bevid%3D76181603%26amp%253Bfbclid%3DIwAR2z0mXNIq9dUHrhONRmRA8qMqt1X3kX6SSs6wCUiXjdjY4skukR99W1nhg) ### Comment > Tracking parameters: > ``` > orgcode= > amp;evid= > amp;fbclid= > ``` > > In other link (`https://cardsoglee.com/products/vulva-vinyl-sticker-vagina-decal-feminist-sticker?_pos=9&_sid=b937d1d6b&_ss=r`) > > Parameters: > ``` > _pos= > _sid= > _ss= > ``` > > Mail code (unfortunately I lost an HTML file or sample): > ``` > > > > > >
> > > > >
>

> This message was forwarded from > 49vuupx9zj@pirolsnet.com > by Temp Mail Forward. > >

>
>
>
I hope you read that in your best Billy Madison voice. 😀 

Soooo......I did a thing! A few weeks back, a friend reached out about an open counseling position at his school. I told him there was NO WAY I could desert my baby (aka the shop) to take a counseling position, so we struck up a deal to where I could counsel part-time while keeping the same shop days & hours. So that means I am officially the college & career counselor at Foothill High School!! Today was my first day, and it felt good! I'm excited to merge both the educator and entrepreneur in me. 

So this leads to my second piece of exciting news...I am able to officially hire my first employee! You'll be seeing a lot more of Nicole (aka my Twinger) at the shop, so please show her some love. If you can even tell the difference between us. 😂

Basically, I just want to say thank you SO much for all the support that you've shown Cards o' Glee since we opened 17 months ago. It's terrifying to go all in on a business, but I have nothing to fear with supportive, generous, and hilarious customers like YOU. I can't wait to see what else is in the cards for Cards o' Glee!! (pun only somewhat intentional 😆)

Okay, now it's time to bust out your calendars because a lot of cool shit is coming up:
  • Friday, August 25th, 6-8pm: Winner, Winner, Chicken Dinner Scavenger Hunt! Free for the whole family. Start at Ruben's to get your map. 
  • Saturday, August 26th, 5-9pm: Paige & Rye Pop-Up Market at Uncommons! There will be over 30 vendors, including yours truly. If you're a west sider, take advantage of the quicker commute to shop with me! It's also close to IKEA, so make a Swedish meatball date of it! 
  • Sunday, August 27th: 6-8pm: Bitchcraft: The Magic of Bookbinding! This workshop is SOLD OUT but have no fear--we'll release it again later this fall! 
  • Tuesday, September 5, 4-8pm: Beer Zombie Market! I won't be there but a lot of great vendors will be! 
  • Saturday, September 9, 4-8pm: FIRST WINE WALK OF THE YEAR!!! Ahoy there mateys, it's pirate-themed! If you buy all your wine walk passes ahead of time, you will save A LOT of money. Check it out here!
  • NEW WORKSHOP ALERT!!! Sunday, September 24th, 5:30-7:30pm: Shannon of Sunshan Studios will be back with a fall-themed earring workshop! Keep your eyes peeled for when the sign-up link goes live later this week. 👀
And now....my fave new thing in the shop! I think it has to be the galaxy vulva sticker by local artist Mary Felker. I also love her desert disco sticker sheet and kinda want to decorate my new office to match it! 

Well friends, I hope you have a deliciously delightful day. 
-Nicole 

P.S. If these emails don't float your boat, simply reply with "Unsubscribe" and I'll take you off the list. But we'll miss you! :) 

--

> > > > >

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/159298](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FAdguardTeam%2FAdguardFilters%2Fissues%2F159298) ### Comment > I applied fix #159298 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/159298) per the comment by BlazDT (re: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/cbc96e48046a8bd262f115d93f36c4f3a7a9e3b5) and still receive the redirect. > > I tried it both in the allow list (per the comment header: 'BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt') and user rules. Neither works and displayPOVadblockerEnabled:true is still present via view-source. > > The only way the website works is to place the root URI into the allow list. Of course, search results are flooded with extraneous, and somewhat unrelated, ads. ### Screenshots

### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> 
> ```
> /^https:\/\/confirm\.[-\w]+\.(com|top)\/[a-z0-9]{32}\/[a-z0-9]{32}\/?$/$all,match-case
> ```

I suppose
```
/^https:\/\/[a-z]{5,7}\.[0-9a-z]{12}\.top\/[0-9a-f]{32}\/[0-9-a-f]{32}\/$/$doc,match-case
/\/[0-9a-f]{32}\/maq\/$/$doc,match-case,domain=com|top
```
plus some genric rules to cover cases like https://urlscan.io/result/c461c600-8641-42fd-8d83-31e4943f862e/

comment.body:
Alex je vous remercie bien mais je ne suis pas informaticien 
voilà le lien ; 
https://www.messagerie.bbox.bouyguestelecom.fr/bbox/mail/mailbox.php?s=2xnbmEcBoaXkapI2JAezKaeU&mailbox=inbox&update=1


et c'est tout ce que je peux vous donnez

 il y a 2 jours je n'avais pas de pub qui était bien bloquées (3 zones) mais hier j'ai été obligé de réinitialiser mon ordi W11 et maintenant tout mes pages sont +/- victimes de pub indésirables , je vais désinstaller "ADGUARD" et le recharger  

je verrais ce que ca donne 

car internet et la PUB ,ca me fait VOMIRE 

salutations 


De : Alex ***@***.***>
À : AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Sujet : Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.messagerie.bbox.bouyguestelecom.fr (Issue #159860)
Date : 23/08/2023 18:26:41 Europe/Paris
Copie à : 18pool49 ***@***.***>;
   Mention ***@***.***>


Hi.
Cannot register. Could you please make screenshot of html code of the ads?

Or please record a HAR file of the page, make an actual screenshot and send it + link of this issue it to ***@***.***
How to get a HAR file:
https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/har_analyzer/

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I don't see any domains here that we could unlock - these are common and serers, used by many apps/sites.

There are three options:
- Use `unfiltered DNS` + `DNS filter`, and unblock the necessary domains
- Use `AdGuard private DNS` and unblock the necessary domains
- Use `AdGuard Home`, and manage filtering of all devices on the network.
